query:
INSERT INTO fca_devotionals (title, content, scripture, scriptureReference, prayer, author, publishDate, featured, category, views, likes, shares)
VALUES (
  'Finding Strength in the Storm',
  'As athletes, we face challenges that test our limits every day. Whether it is a tough practice, a difficult opponent, or the pressure of competition, we need a source of strength that goes beyond our physical abilities. Today scripture reminds us that our true power comes from Christ. When you step onto the field, court, or track today, remember that you are not alone. God is with you in every sprint, every play, every moment. Your faith is your foundation, and through Him, you can accomplish more than you ever imagined.',
  'I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.',
  'Philippians 4:13',
  'Lord, thank You for being my strength when I am weak. Help me to rely on You in every competition, every practice, and every moment of my athletic journey. Give me the courage to face challenges knowing You are with me. Amen.',
  'Chad A. Dozier',
  CURDATE(),
  'yes',
  'Strength',
  0, 0, 0
)
command:

God is with you in every sprint, every play, every moment. Your faith is your foundation, and through Him, you can accomplish more than you ever imagined.',

  'Chad A. Dozier',
